def_cn: 头号的;头等的;最重要的
def_en: Number one means better, more important, or more popular than anything else of its kind.

def_cn: 排行榜冠军(指周销售量最高的流行歌曲CD、歌手或乐队组合)
def_en: In popular music, the number one is the best selling CD in any one week, or the group or person who has made that CD.

def_cn: 只想到自己的利益;只顾自己
def_en: If you are looking out for number one, you are thinking of yourself rather than considering other people.
